articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.title: Phew! The risk of that asteroid hitting Earth in 2032 has significantly lowered - The Verge
articles.description: Following NASA saying the odds dropped to 0.28 percent, the European Space Agency now says there’s just a 0.16 percent chance of asteroid 2024 YR4 hitting Earth.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency says theres now just a 0.16 percent chance that asteroid 2024 YR4 will impact our planet.
